metadata.name: Show Mercy!
metadata.description:
When faced with the wrath of god, you can only pray for mercy.

This piece depicts a rich man praying for mercy when faced by the judgment of god.

Over 64hrs of work
Drawn digitally using XP-Pen Tablet
Software used Adobe Photoshop
File Info:.PNG 1296x1728 2.4MB

1GB USB Drive containing original art files (.jpg.png.pdf .psd) and 4 exclusive videos of art process.

USB only guaranteed for first buyer. Shipping and packaging included.
